summary: the evidence base for public health emergency preparedness is weak, however. previous reviews have noted a substantial proportion of anecdotal event reports. a scoping review was conducted with two objectives: first, to develop a thematic map focused on primary research; and second, to use this map to guide an understanding of knowledge gaps relevant to research and practice in PHEP. key themes and knowledge gaps in the PHEP evidence base were identified. electronic supplementary material available to authorized users.
